SEARCH
Package main.app

Class ApplicantHandler

java.lang.Object
main.app.ApplicantHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUserHandler
public class ApplicantHandler extends Object implements IUserHandler
Handles all CLI interactions for an Applicant user. Provides access to BTO applications, enquiries, and password changes.
